items.title: 2 children killed, 17 hurt in mass shooting at Catholic school church
items.description: An 8-year-old and 10-year-old were shot and killed when a gunman fired shots through the windows of a church at the Annunciation Catholic School in Mi...

items.title: FDA approves updated COVID vaccines with restrictions
items.description: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration on Wednesday approved updated COVID-19 vaccines with restrictions on who can receive the shots.

items.title: WATCH:  Student at Minneapolis Catholic school describes shooting
items.description: A student at Annunciation Catholic School in Minneapolis described hearing gunfire during a shooting at the school on Wednesday morning.
